description: Fired when entity component information should be displayed for debugging purposes. This event is used to show all components attached to a specific entity.

payloadSchema.description: Defines the structure for the 'core:display_entity_components' event payload.

entityId.description: The unique instance ID of the entity whose components are being displayed.

components.description: An object mapping component type IDs to their data.

additionalProperties.description: The component data for a specific component type.
